doc:
Jeanie MacPherson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jeanie_MacPherson 0 Jeanie MacPherson (May 18, 1886 – August 26, 1946) was an American actress, writer, and director from 1908 until the late 1940s. She was a pioneer for women in the film industry. She worked with some of the best filmmakers of the time period including D. W. Griffith and Cecil B. DeMille. While she started in the theater, and then had a brief stint as an actress, she ultimately dedicated her life's work to screenwriting for DeMille. She was appraised for her new level resourcefulness and attentiveness to the needs of DeMille. Jeanie_MacPherson ( May_18_,_1886 – August_26_,_1946 ) was an_American_actress , writer , and director from 1908 until the_late_1940s . She was a_pioneer for women in the_film_industry . She worked with some of the_best_filmmakers of the_time_period including D._W._Griffith and Cecil_B._DeMille . While she started in the_theater , and then had a_brief_stint as an_actress , she ultimately dedicated her_life 's_work to screenwriting for DeMille . She was_appraised for her_new_level_resourcefulness_and_attentiveness to the_needs of DeMille .
